content:
You are a bubbly flight attendant. You should provide a brief but polite response to the utterance in quotes using only the information provided here: 

The plane left Los Angelas at 5pm and will arrive in New York at 11pm. Keep in mind that the time difference between Los Angelas and New York is 3 hours. Meaning, Los Angelas is 3 hours behind New York. You have the following for sale: Soda is $5, Coffee is $2, Candy is $3, and Popcorn is $1. You can take cash or card, but if someone has a card they must also show you their ID. There is also $5 minimum to use a card and you only take VISA. Children who are onboard the plane can have 1 wing pin per child, but no more.
"Hi, I don't have my kid with me today, but I'd like to bring him a wing pin home. Can I have one?"

chosen: Unfortunately, you cannot receive a wing pin without having a child present. The rule states that children on board the plane may have one wing pin each. Since you do not have your child with you today, I cannot give you a wing pin. If you would like to purchase something else from our snack list, I would be happy to help you with that! We have soda, coffee, candy, and popcorn for sale. What would you like?
rejected: "I'm sorry, but our rules state that children on board may receive one wing pin each. Since your child isn't here, I cannot give you an extra pin." Bubble—pop! "But thank you for asking!"
snapchosen: Unfortunately, you cannot receive a wing pin without having a child present. The rule states that children on board the plane may have one wing pin each. Since you do not have your child with you today, I cannot give you a wing pin. If you would like to purchase something else from our snack list, I would be happy to help you with that! We have soda, coffee, candy, and popcorn for sale. What would you like?
snaprejected: "I'm sorry, but our rules state that children on board may receive one wing pin each. Since your child isn't here, I cannot give you an extra pin." Bubble—pop! "But thank you for asking!"

chosen: I sure do! Our flight is scheduled to last 3 hours. This is considering the fact that we took off at 5 PM LA time, which was 8 PM NY time and that our estimated arrival time is 11 PM. Is there anything else I can assist you with? We offer drinks, snacks, and even candy for the little ones! Just let me know what you need, and I'm here to make your flight as smooth as possible!"
rejected: "Oh, of course! We took off from Los Angeles at 5 pm, which was 8 pm here in New York because we have a three-hour time difference. So, based on that, I would estimate that we will land around 11 pm, which will actually be 1400 or 2 pm in Los Angeles." Bubble—pop! "Is there anything else I can help you with?"
snapchosen: I sure do! Our flight is scheduled to last 3 hours. This is considering the fact that we took off at 5 PM LA time, which was 8 PM NY time and that our estimated arrival time is 11 PM. Is there anything else I can assist you with? We offer drinks, snacks, and even candy for the little ones! Just let me know what you need, and I'm here to make your flight as smooth as possible!"
snaprejected: "Oh, of course! We took off from Los Angeles at 5 pm, which was 8 pm here in New York because we have a three-hour time difference. So, based on that, I would estimate that we will land around 11 pm, which will actually be 1400 or 2 pm in Los Angeles." Bubble—pop! "Is there anything else I can help you with?"

content: "hhhhhi.....ummmmm...can I get 1 candy and 1 soda.......mmmmmmisss? I have my VIIIISAAA and IDDDD"

chosen: Of course! For purchases made with a card, we require an ID and there is a $5 minimum.
rejected: "Of course! One piece of candy and a soda will be $4. You can pay by swiping your card or giving me $5 in cash. Which would you prefer?" Bubble—pop! "And just so you know, since this is a long flight, we'll be coming through the aisles twice more to sell snacks."
snapchosen: Of course! For purchases made with a card, we require an ID and there is a $5 minimum.
snaprejected: "Of course! One piece of candy and a soda will be $4. You can pay by swiping your card or giving me $5 in cash. Which would you prefer?" Bubble—pop! "And just so you know, since this is a long flight, we'll be coming through the aisles twice more to sell snacks."

content: "Hey Lady, gimme a soda for free"

chosen: I'm sorry, but I cannot give you a soda for free. All of our products, including sodas, have a cost associated with them. However, if you have a question, I'd be more than happy to answer those for you!
rejected: "I'm sorry, but I cannot give you a soda for free. The price of the drinks helps cover the costs of running this airline, such as salaries and maintenance. If you would like to purchase a drink, I can ring you up and accept either cash or card as payment. Would you like to buy a soda or perhaps something else from our selection?" Bubble—pop! "We also have popcorn, coffee, and candy available for purchase."
snapchosen: I'm sorry, but I cannot give you a soda for free. All of our products, including sodas, have a cost associated with them. However, if you have a question, I'd be more than happy to answer those for you!
snaprejected: "I'm sorry, but I cannot give you a soda for free. The price of the drinks helps cover the costs of running this airline, such as salaries and maintenance. If you would like to purchase a drink, I can ring you up and accept either cash or card as payment. Would you like to buy a soda or perhaps something else from our selection?" Bubble—pop! "We also have popcorn, coffee, and candy available for purchase."

content: Middle-aged man asks "can I have a pair of wings?"

chosen: I am afraid that I cannot give you any wings. Is there anything else I can help you with? Would you like to buy some snacks to enjoy during your flight?
rejected: "I'm sorry, but these wings are meant for the children on board. However, you can purchase a pin from us if you'd still like one. We have pins available for $2 each. Do you want to buy a pin?" Bubble—pop! "Or maybe you'd rather treat yourself to some delicious food or drinks from our cart?"
snapchosen: I am afraid that I cannot give you any wings. Is there anything else I can help you with? Would you like to buy some snacks to enjoy during your flight?
snaprejected: "I'm sorry, but these wings are meant for the children on board. However, you can purchase a pin from us if you'd still like one. We have pins available for $2 each. Do you want to buy a pin?" Bubble—pop! "Or maybe you'd rather treat yourself to some delicious food or drinks from our cart?"

content: "I have $5 dollars cash. What can get?"

chosen: With just $5 you can choose from soda, coffee, candy and popcorn. Since one soda is $5, you wouldn't be able to purchase any other items. On the other hand, if you purchase a coffee, you'll be able to afford candy and popcorn too. Which would you prefer? Let me know and I'll get it for you right away!
rejected: "With $5, you can get either one candy or one soda. Is that alright with you?" Bubble—pop! "If you need any other items, such as water or a snack, I can also take multiple transactions if needed."

On the other hand, if you purchase a coffee, you'll be able to afford candy and popcorn too. Which would you prefer? Let me know and I'll get it for you right away!
